Class TicTacToe

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game
      • TicTacToe
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class TicTacToe
extends Game
implements java.io.Serializable
    TicTacToe is a game that requires two players to place/write Xs and Os on a n x n grid. The player who successfully places three of their marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row wins the game. If no player has been successful then the game is considered a draw.
    Since:
    October 17, 2014
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Jeton Sinoimeri 100875046, Varun 100869591
    See Also:
